title: Pressurize Suit
details:
Ensure all seals are secure.
Activate primary oxygen supply and monitor pressure gauge until it reaches 4.3 psi.
Confirm green light on the console.

title: Communications Check
details:
Activate helmet communications.
Perform a radio check with MAITRI on primary channel.
Verify secondary channel is clear.

title: Helmet & Visor Check
details:
Lock helmet into neck ring. Listen for audible click.
Lower and seal the protective visor.
Confirm HUD is active and displaying vitals.

title: Airlock Depressurization
details:
Seal inner airlock door.
Initiate depressurization sequence from the wall panel.
Wait for pressure to equalize with exterior environment.

title: Open Outer Hatch
details:
Once depressurization is complete and confirmed, unlatch and open the outer airlock hatch.
Proceed with EVA mission.
